message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this item. I think it's really worthwhile. How about a starting price of $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $60 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for.  Could you do $100?
I'm still interested, but I can only go up to $80. That's the highest I'm willing to pay.
